app.name: NeoPop GX
app.long_description:
Emulator updated by megalomaniac.
This is a port of Neopop, a Neo Geo Pocket/Neo Geo Pocket Color emulator originally created by NeopopUK, for GC/Wii developed using libogc. Please read changelog.txt for list of changes. Visit http://www.gc-forever.com for any questions and updates.
